page.title: 08THE WHITE HOUSE continued
page.content: Lady Waechter feeds the hounds once a day if giving them cooked meat, but only every other day if raw meat is fed.They are walked three times a day. She has 21 and a half couples(43hounds When going hunting between12and a half and 18 and a half couples are hunted. The puppies are walked for about 6 months.They are usually 16 months old when they begin hunting.Lady Waechter continues to use the hounds until they are about 7 years old, although good hounds hunt until 9 years old. Lady Waechter also farms.She used to be a hop farmer, with 260 acres but having come out of hops, she sold land and now farms 50 acres.She has 22 beef cattle and 10 calves.She rears some calves herself, others she buys through Mr.G.Brooke (of Barley Farm). She keeps aJersey cow for her own milk etc.She grows barley and oats for feed
